TextView.android:text: 2. In which country were you born?
4. In which country have you lived most of your life?
5. What is the highest level of education you have completed
6. Which of the following best describes your employment status?
7. What type of house do you live in?
9. Approximately when was your house built?
10. How many occupants live in your house?
11. Which of the following appliances do you have in your house?
12. I am concerned about the amount of my residential energy consumption.
13. I would like to consume lower energy at home.
14. I would like to consume energy at home more efficiently.
15. I would like to make a more efficient energy usage for the following reasons:
Contribute to the grid reliability, e.g. prevent a blackout
Others do not, so I do
16. I would like to use the following means to make a more efficient residential usage of energy:
Shifting the consumption of appliances at different times, e.g. during off-peak night times
17. Discomfort, by automated control of residential appliances for a more efficient energy usage, results in:
Feeling cold in cold winters or feeling warm in warm summers.
Extra costs for special equipment and appliances.
Changing my overall lifestyle at home
Doing my daily residential activities at different and maybe undesirable times.
18. I would like to accept discomfort to make more efficient energy usage.
19. I would like to sacrifice energy efficiency to experience a low discomfort.
20. I would like to be more energy efficient if I know that others are more energy efficient as well.
21. I can accept a discomfort caused by energy efficiency if others can accept it as well.
22. I would not like to be energy efficient if others are not energy efficient as well.
23. I would not like to experience higher discomfort by energy efficiency if others do not experience higher as well.
24. I would like to allow technology to schedule a more efficient energy usage of my appliances.
25. I am willing to schedule the use of appliances to make more efficient energy usage.
26. Scheduling of appliances to make a more efficient energy usage best works for me:
27. For which discomfort level would you like to overtake control back over an appliance scheduled for an efficient energy usage?
28. To which devices you would allow automated control for a more efficient energy usage?
